channel.title: Problem With Hosting
channel.description: hi, im going to be hosting a server but were having some troubles with portforwarding, we've tryed so many things but we just cant get it working could someone please help me out ? also the owner of the server is telling me not to use the legit source first but to use a test source .. will this work please tell me?
